column4: have you tried disconnecting your router and going directly to your cable modem?  If you can ping a domain and get a response back but not connect to any web site or establish any other kind of connection sounds like something is wrong firewall or routing wise
no you haven't?  Well try it.
ok, the alternative is to continue to beg for help in the channel.  I'm offering help.  Good luck.
see if you would have listened to me you have found it was your router an hour ago :)
